Rules - Class in game
A placed Stone is valid if: it is located on a location where the Board is Feature.EMPTY, i.e.: it is not located outside the Board playable grid, i.e., where the Board is Feature.SIDE, it is not located on top of another Stone, it is not located outside the bounds of the full grid, it commits suicide: it will immediately be removed from the board (along with any group it may have been part of, if the suicide leads to the capture of a group of the opponent, the opponent group is removed from the board first, after which the suicide stone has liberties again and does not need to be removed from the board, as it will always have at least one liberty.
Rules() - Constructor for class game.Rules
 
Rules.DynamicalValidator - Class in game
The dynamical validator class to dynamically validate boards with.
